body_html:
Given that you have 1e9 elements, I would return a generator without materializing the tensor. The generator would sample.random numbers in the range 0-1e9.
This means you could have repeated samples, but at least you wouldn't run out of memory

This means you could have repeated samples, but at least you wouldn't run out of memory
body:
Given that you have 1e9 elements, I would return a generator without materializing the tensor. The generator would sample.random numbers in the range 0-1e9.
This means you could have repeated samples, but at least you wouldn't run out of memory
